channel.title: code block on Not A Rocket Scientist
channel.description: Recent content in code block on Not A Rocket Scientist

item.title: Hugo Syntax Highlight Bash
item.description: # some code echo "Hello World" $ cat tmp.txt $ head -n 100 tmp.txt $ tail -n 100 tmp.txt # some awk code tail -n +2 refseq_genes_hg38.txt | awk ' BEGIN{OFS="\t"}{ if($4=="+") {print $3,$5,$5+1,$2 "_" $13,".",$4} else {print $3,$6-1,$6,$2 "_" $13,".",$4} }' > refseq_hg38_UCSC_TSS.bed $ echo "Hello World" $ cat tmp.txt $ head -n 100 tmp.txt $ tail -n 100 tmp.txt
